yo_ex: "Yo hablo contigo - I speak with you"
tu_ex: "Tu hablas cada dia - You speak each day"
nos_ex: "Nosotros hablamos a veces - we speak sometimes"
ellos_ex: "Ellos hablan mucho - they speak a lot"

yo_ex: "Yo como a casa - I eat at home"
el_ex: "Ella come conmigo - She eats with me"
nos_ex: "comemos mucho aqui - we eat a lot here"

el_ex: "Ella vive con su hermano - She lives with her brother"
nos_ex: "vivimos en este pueblo - we live in this village"
ellos_ex: "Ellas viven en los Estados Unidos - they live in the United States"

yo_def: "Yo compraba - I bought or I was buying or I used to buy"
yo_ex: "Yo compraba muchas cosas - I bought many things"
tu_def: "Tu comprabas - You bought or you were buying or you used to buy"
el_ex: "El compraba pescado aqui - he bought fish here"
nos_ex: "comprábamos comida para cena - we bought food for dinner"

yo_ex: "Yo corría cada dia - I ran each day"
tu_ex: "Tu corrías con su perro - You ran with your dog"
el_ex: "Ella corría conmigo - She ran with me"
nos_ex: "corriamos cada semana - We ran each week"
ellos_ex: "Ellos nunca corrian en escuela - They never ran in school"

yo_ex: "Yo escribía a ella - I wrote to her"
tu_ex: "escribías un libro - You wrote a book"
nos_ex: "Nosotros escribíamos en escuela - We wrote in school"
ellos_ex: "Ellos escribían contigo - They wrote with you"

yo_ex: "Yo miré a el - I looked at him"
el_ex: "Ella me miró esta mañana - she looked at me this morning"
nos_ex: "Nosotros lo miramos - We looked at it"
ellos_ex: "Ellos te miraron - They looked at you"

yo_ex: "Bebí mucho esta noche - I drank a lot tonight"
tu_ex: "Tu bebiste dos cervesas - You drank two beers"
el_ex: "El bebió con ella - He drank with her"
nos_ex: "Nosotros bebimos todo noche - We drank all night"
ellos_ex: "Ellos bebieron el vino - They drank the wine"

yo_ex: "Yo partí porque era tarde - I left because it was late"
tu_ex: "Tu partiste la fiesta - You left the party"
el_ex: "Ella partió y estaba enojada - She left and she was mad"

yo_ex: "Yo escucharé pronto - I will hear soon"
tu_ex: "Tu escucharás de mí - You will hear from me"
el_ex: "El te escuchará - He will listen to you"
nos_ex: "Nosotros escucharemos a musica - We will listen to music"
ellos_ex: "Ellos le escucharán - They will listen to him"

yo_def: "Yo poderán - I will be able to"
yo_ex: "Yo poderán lo - I will be able to do it"
tu_def: "Tu poderás - You will be able to"
tu_ex: "Tu poderás mañana - You will be able to tomorrow"
el_def: "El poderá - He will be able to"
el_ex: "El poderá te caminar - He will be able to walk with you"
nos_def: "Nosotros poderemos - We will be able to"
nos_ex: "Nosotros poderemos otro semana - We will be able to another week"
ellos_def: "Ellos poderán - They will be able to"
ellos_ex: "Ellos no poderán - They will not be able"

yo_ex: "Yo recibiré dinero pronto - I will recieve money soon"
tu_ex: "Tu recibirás muchas cosas - You will recieve many things"
el_ex: "Ella recibirá cartas de mi - She will recieve letters for me"
nos_ex: "Nosotros recibiremos crédito - We will recieve credit"
ellos_ex: "Ellos recibirán comida - They will recieve food"

yo_ex: "Yo ayudaría con eso - I would help with that"
tu_ex: "Ayudarías a mi mamá mañana - Would you help my mom tomorrow"
el_ex: "Ella ayudaría la escuela - She would help the school"
nos_ex: "Nosotros ayudaríamos si possible - We would help if possible"
ellos_ex: "Ellos ayudarían al otro país - They would help the other country"

yo_ex: "Yo entenderían mejor manana - I would understand better tomorrow"
tu_ex: "entenderías muchas cosas a eso tiempo - You would understand many things from that time"
el_ex: "El nunca entendería - He would never understand"
nos_ex: "Entenderíamos más si viéramos - We would understand more if we saw"
ellos_ex: "they would understand if we left - entenderían si nos fuéramos"
